aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.paragraph1: At the heart of our brand lies a deep love for beauty, craftsmanship, and meaningful expression. We are a silver jewelry house dedicated to creating timeless pieces from the finest 925 sterling silver — each one designed to become a cherished part of your story.
aboutUs.paragraph2: Our commitment to excellence begins with our materials. We use only high-quality 925 silver, known for its purity, durability, and luminous finish. This foundation ensures that every piece not only looks stunning, but lasts a lifetime and beyond.
aboutUs.paragraph3: Behind every design is the hand and heart of our lead designer — an artist with a passion for detail and emotion. Drawing inspiration from nature, love, and the quiet poetry of everyday moments, they create pieces that speak softly yet powerfully. Each curve, sparkle, and silhouette is thoughtfully crafted to highlight your individuality and grace.
aboutUs.paragraph4: We believe that jewelry should not only adorn but also connect — to memories, to feelings, and to your truest self.
aboutUs.paragraph5: Welcome to a world where elegance meets meaning, and where every piece tells a story — yours.

sectionGallery.title: Introducing our new collection of elegance
sectionGallery.paragraph1: Introducing our new Collection – a celebration of renewal and romance captured in gleaming 925 sterling silver. Each piece tells a story of springtime awakening, delicately crafted by our master artisans to embody both timeless sophistication and contemporary design.
sectionGallery.paragraph2: Like the first bloom after a long winter, these creations whisper of new beginnings and the quiet beauty of love.
sectionGallery.paragraph3: Our designer has translated these fleeting moments into wearable treasures – poetry in silver – that will adorn you with subtle radiance and speak to the heart.
sectionGallery.paragraph4: Let every curve, every shimmer, remind you of your own grace, your strength, and the infinite tenderness that lives within.

ringDetail.measureInstructionsRing: How to Measure Using a Ring
ringDetail.measureRingStep1: Take an existing ring that fits you well.
ringDetail.measureRingStep2: Place the ring on a ruler.
ringDetail.measureRingStep3: Measure the inner diameter in millimeters (from inside edge to inside edge).
ringDetail.measureRingStep4: Compare the measurement to the diameter in the table below.
ringDetail.measureFingerStep1: Wrap a thin strip of paper or string around the base of your finger.
ringDetail.measureFingerStep2: Mark where the ends meet with a pen.
ringDetail.measureFingerStep3: Measure the length in millimeters with a ruler.
ringDetail.measureFingerStep4: Compare the measurement to the circumference in the table below.
ringDetail.measureFingerStep5: Measure in the evening for accuracy, as fingers may swell slightly.
ringDetail.measureFingerStep6: If between sizes, choose the larger size for comfort.
